short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate text on PDF/HTML/TXT in two clicks, even for local docs. Now with ChatGPT support.
short.es: Traduce texto en PDF/HTML/TXT en dos clics, incluso en documentos locales. Ahora con soporte de ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìñ Usage: Simply select text within any document. Then, press Alt+Shift+A for an immediate translation (except for local PDF documents), or right-click on the text and choose 'Translate <your selected text>'. The translation will appear directly under your selection. Now, with the integration of ChatGPT and Microsoft Translator, the extension offers more accurate and context-aware translations, catering to a wider range of language preferences.

üîç Interactive Features: Clicking the extension button opens a popup window, where you can edit your selection. Customize your experience by setting shortcuts, choosing languages (supported by both Microsoft Translator and ChatGPT), configuring the popup window, and adding a 'Search the web' link for detailed information. The dual translation providers ensure a robust and versatile translation experience.

üåê Compatibility: This extension works seamlessly with native PDF formats but is not compatible with protected or scanned documents. To translate local documents (PDF, TXT, HTML, etc.), enable the "Allow access to file URLs" option on the chrome://extensions page.

‚öôÔ∏è Recent Updates and Improvements:
- v4.3.118: Addition of 'Remove Line Breaks' feature, which allows for the removal of line breaks in the text selected for translation. This enhancement is particularly useful for PDF files with columns or intricate layouts, improving the quality of translations.
- v4.3.115: Integration of ChatGPT as a new, advanced translation provider üß†.
- v4.2.112: Addition of Spanish locale üá™üá∏.
- v4.2.103: Chrome-extension scheme exclusion üö´.
- v4.2.102: Support for right-to-left language direction ‚û°Ô∏è‚¨ÖÔ∏è.
- v4.2.101: 'Search the web' field added to Options üîé.
- Ongoing improvements in response time ‚è±Ô∏è, API support, and overall functionality üí°.

Para traducir documentos locales (PDF, TXT, HTML, etc.), debe habilitar la opci√≥n "Permitir acceso a URL de archivos" en la p√°gina chrome://extensions para esta extensi√≥n.

‚öôÔ∏è Actualizaciones y Mejoras Recientes:
